Plot: A group of high school teenagers and their parents attempt to navigate the many ways the Internet has changed their relationships, their communication, their self-image, and their love lives.
Title: Men, Women & Children
Writer: Jason Reitman (screenplay), Erin Cressida Wilson (screenplay), Chad Kultgen (novel)
Actors: Adam Sandler, Jennifer Garner, Rosemarie DeWitt, Judy Greer
tomatoConsensus: Men, Women & Children is timely, but director Jason Reitman's overbearing approach to its themes blunts the movie's impact.
